attributes.action: Acknowledge Royal Mail as a necessary infrastructure and public service and take over the running of it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal mail is not a business and is a part of the UK's infrastructure, every time they strike many businesses will fail causing loss of jobs and reduction in new enterprise in the UK.  The government should take this infrastructure back into Government running for none profit and restabalise a much needed back bone of the UK economy!
